name: Car Parking Mania - 3D Real Driving Simulator Game
name_original: Car Parking Mania - 3D Real Driving Simulator Game
description:
Car Parking Mania is a 3D car simulator game.
This game simulates various parking skill.
In this game, you can get an overall view of the car’s position in a 3D optic angle outside the car.
And you can also shift to the inside of the car to get a driver's view, and also get an adjustable view of miror.

*****************************************************
Key Features:
- Ring sport system
- Car color selection
- Best time for each level
- 50 levels for car, 50 for truck and 50 levels for bus sample scene that tested by games
- 3 Different type of controls (Steering wheel,Arrow keys and Accel)

*****************************************************

Enjoy the game!
